data.name: Crystal Story Dawn of Dusk Demo
data.detailed_description:
Crystal story: Dawn Of Dusk


Crystal Story: Dawn of Dusk is an Action-RPG that blends together charming retro-style graphics with fast-paced action, heavily inspired by 16-bit classics!



Players will take the role of Mina, a young adventurer from the Dawnside, who travels to a strange and shattered world called the Duskside, to save her brother who has been kidnapped by the forces of a great demon named Termina.



In this episodic series, she grows into the role of a true knight through her adventures, and learns powerful fire elemental magic called Arts. These Arts allow her to navigate harsh terrain while battling the shadowy foes that stand in her way.

Features:


  • Use magic abilities called Arts to traverse a challenging world and defeat enemies and solve puzzles!
  • A hybrid retro-modern-styled adventure will bring you back to the past, but with a modern twist!
  • Fly around the Duskside and take on optional side quests!
  • Completely playable with an XBox One Controller or Keyboard!
  • Includes an optional CRT filter for nostalgic flair!

data.short_description: Crystal Story: Dawn of Dusk is an Action-RPG that blends charming retro-style graphics with fast-paced action, heavily inspired by 16-bit classics!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
